I pride myself on my communication and professionalism, and your trust in me is not taken lightly.  You can easily find my past two campaigns and see I have made regular updates detailing the status and progress on every step of the campaign.
And I'm taking it even further this time.  Every Tuesday night, join me on Twitch as I continue to produce and create Sasquanaut right before you eyes one page at a time.  Join the conversation about the creative process and ask any questions on how to make a comic and know without a doubt that your money is being put to work. 

 
 
 
 
 
Risks & Challenges
As a crowd funding supporter myself, I know what it means to give your hard earned money to new and unknown projects.
I have made every effort to minimize the risk to you, the backer.  
This includes having the issue 100% completed before you even see this page.  
At my own expense I have paid and received ALL the art from Gab Santos for the entire 6 issues of volume 1.
This campaign is full of merchandise and original art that is already completed and of the absolute highest quality, as well as being ready to ship to make the fulfillment process as brief and efficient as possible.
When the campaign successfully ends, with your help, the files will be loaded to the printer when the funding comes in, digital rewards can be sent upon receiving completed surveys, and coloring and lettering can continue on all remaining issues.
Issues 1, 2, and 3 Kickstarter campaigns and fulfillment went as smoothly as I could possibly hope for, and so far I have received universal praise on the quality and timeliness of the projects. That's not to say I didn't learn a few things that I believe will better assist in completing and shipping all rewards to everyone.
I love this book and I want everyone who takes part of this campaign to love this book as much as I and have a completely satisfied experience on Kickstarter with me and Gab. 
My experience with IndieGoGo is limited, and working the interface to build the campaign has been a bit of a struggle.  I have attempted to make the choice of variant cover as part of the "OPTIONS" in the perks.  I hope this works as I believe it should, otherwise there could be some confusion and difficulty.
If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to message me and I will do my absolute best to make this project as rewarding as possible.
Thank you for your time and your support!

 
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Spread the word and make some noise about this campaign
Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

 THANK YOU!  Thank you for checking out my project.  You being here and showing interest in something that I have spent several years putting together and out into the world  means the world to me.  You are making my dreams come true and I cannot express how much this means.We are in an amazing new golden age for independent and self published comics, and it is driven by  wonderful people like you who support passion projects, like this one.  Again thank you.Volume 1 of Savage Sasquanaut is 6 issues long. Issues 1 - 3 have been met with universal praise, and I've worked relentlessly seek to create comics of impeccable quality for your enjoyment. This series is the beginning of what I hope will be so much more, and I cannot wait to share them all with you.  This is happening because of you, thank you.Also thanks to the Envato Marketplace for allowing me to purchase the right to use such a dope song and the killer stock footage. Also thanks to Fiverr.com for hooking up the Cosmic Roots Studio logo animation.PLEASE review the different REWARD PACKAGES and SELECT the one you like, and complete your pre-order for the best new sci-fi hero you've never heard of.

story:
Issue two of Plainer Jane is here! The darkly comic story of Jane Pearson, a seemingly ordinary teenage girl who becomes a brutally efficient killer for hire.

In chapter 1, 'A Means to an End', we saw Jane decide on her chosen profession as a killer for hire, and dip her toe in the murky waters of professional assassination. In this issue (issue 2 of 7, don't worry if you haven't got issue 1 as you can get a copy as an addon) we find her progressing in her chosen career, and learning that there's sometimes a lot more to killing people for money than simply sneaking up with a knife.

With no training, no special skills, just her own cunning, brutality, and fearlessness, Jane leaves a trail of bodies behind her, ultimately going head to head with the feared and secretive criminal gang, The Nexus, in a war that could ultimately cost not only her life but the lives of everyone she loves.

A real world comic book set in modern day Manchester. 

 

Issue 1 was funded late last year and has been really well received as you can see from the reviews and comments below. If you missed it, exclusive printed copies are available with many of the issue 2 rewards, and a free PDF will be provided with all rewards.

Once again our front cover artist Ralf Singh has done some amazing work, along with gorgeous hand drawn sequential art by Wayne Lowden and guest sequential artist Fiona Oakley. In addition Donna Anita Black has produced another stunning rear cover painting of an iconic image in Manchester music history, Salford Lad's Club. 

 

Some great rewards are available, including T-Shirts, stickers, postcards, badges, and signed prints of both front and rear covers.  Some original issue #2 art is also available. These are full large (A3) hand drawn and inked pieces on Bristol board, the original pencil sketch work for the pages will also be included. A PDF of the available pages is here: Original Art PDF 

In addition to the rewards you can select on the right, all physical rewards will also include the following. 

  • Digital copies of Issues 1 & 2 
  • The full set of four postcards, two stickers, and three badges
  • An A4 print of the Frank Miller style noir variant cover by Nestor Celario Jr. This is shown below!

 

Comic Book News (Full Review) 

  • "Hit’s all the right notes for a first issue and has me excited for its next chapter"
  •  "I can highly recommend Plainer Jane." 
  • "Sublimely delivers"  

 

Set The Tape (Full Review)

  • "Plainer Jane is definitely worth checking out."
  • "4/5 Stars" 
  • "...might just become one of your most anticipated books of 2021"  

 

Howie's World of Comics (Full Review)

  • "5 Stars (Highly recommended)"
  • "A professionally written story with stylised art that will leave you wanting more."
  • "I dived into the world of crime as promised with a character that I was far too easy to relate to for my liking." 

 

 Pipe Dream Comics (Full Review)

  • "a really compelling and well-crafted first issue."
  • "a strong debut with bags of potential for it to become something really interesting." 

 

 3MillionYears (Full Review)

  • "An excellent introduction that promises more."
  • "...it’s dark and has some excellent storytelling."

 

 

READER PRAISE FOR ISSUE #1

  • "Plainer Jane is a dark and beautiful vision of modern day Manchester with a protagonist that hits all the right notes."
  • "It’s here! First kickstarter I've ever backed. As soon as I heard it was Manchester based and the writer was a Manc I was all in. This story didn't disappoint." 
  • "I need the next issue now! Good work" 
  • "Absolutely loved it and I just want to know more! Roll on the next issue I say."  
  • "Thought I'd have a quick look at this while my lunch was cooking. Got sucked in. Burned my lunch. Recommended!" 
  • "Really enjoyed the first issue - looking forward to the rest!"
  • "Very good writing! The physical comic will make a fine addition to my collection."

David Wilburn (Writer, creator): After spending 20 years working as a Guinness World Record breaking escapologist, sword swallower, and stuntman (David Straitjacket, look me up!), I decided to return to my first loves, music and comics. Plainer Jane is my debut book, it was originally planned as a one shot short graphic novel but its world expanded until I had a deep, layered book which I am going to release as a series of campaigns. I wrote Plainer Jane because the story sat in my head for years, and I just couldn't shake it loose without putting it on paper. The book is fully written and I can't wait to get all the issues released, if only because the ending is fantastic and I hate having to keep the secret! I live in Manchester UK, where it doesn't rain as much as you probably think it does. 

If you like, you can listen to my playlist of the music that I listened too while writing the book, and that I like to imagine Jane listening to while she goes about her 'work', Plainer Jane Spotify Playlist - You can also follow me on Instagram and on Facebook. 

Wayne Lowden (Sequential art): Our sequential art genius has been working in comics for years. Notably drawing and inking Akio, Nocturne, Abyssal Albion, and Sharks on a Train. His own book,  Noliverlowdy Dribbles and Scribbles Vol 1 is available on Amazon. He describes himself as a big music fan and a reluctant early morning dog walker. Sorry, no photo for Wayne. In his words he "doesn't like his face on things".  

Tim West (Logos, lettering, print layout): Tim has been working in indie comics for over a decade. Designing amazing logos, writing, lettering, editing, blogging, and more. He has published his own book, 'Get Woke', as well as the indie anthology Killer Bytes.

Ralf Singh (Front Covers, Colourist): In 2014 Ralf dropped out of university to pursue his passion for drawing comics. Since then he has published comics for numerous publishers in Germany, the USA, and Italy. Among them is his very own comic Zinnober which sold 8,000 copies world-wide. 

Donna A Black (Rear Covers): Donna is a mixed media artist specializing in comic art and covers. Originally trained as a photographer she uses her skill with lighting and composition to give her mixed media artworks a very unique look and feel. She has had been involved in many group shows and major solo shows across Ireland and the UK.

Fiona Oakley (Guest Artist, page one): Fiona is a British visual artist specialising in Drawing, with a wide range of interests, experience, and skills in this area. As a comic book artist Fiona has worked with clients in the UK, Australia and New York. She is especially drawn to projects that present complex female characters who stand outside narrow definitions of ‘femininity’.

Manchester is an historic and visually wonderful city. With gleaming skyscrapers and modern apartment blocks butting up against Roman barracks, medieval churches, and fine Gothic architecture. It is dirty and clean, old and modern, rich and poor, rainy and sunny. It gave us the women’s suffrage movement, the industrial revolution, the computer, and some of the best music ever made. It is the city I grew up in, and it is the perfect backdrop for Jane's story.

 

 

    SOME FINAL INFORMATION:

    The printing specifications will be 26 pages in standard US comic book size, printed on 130gsm silk paper with a 250gsm cover.  The book looks fantastic!

    Everything will be sent using high quality packaging. I have spent the last 5 years running a mail order record company so I am very experienced in order packing and fulfillment.

    Shipping is, unfortunately, an unavoidable expense. High-Res digital copies are available if the shipping cost proves to high. I understand that money can be tight and have tried to make everything as affordable as possible. 

    As for packing I have spent 5 years running an online record company so I am very experienced in shipping delicate stuff around the world. All comics will be bagged before being packed in good quality comic mailers (Defendapack A4 Book Mailers) with additional cardboard stiffeners. T-Shirts will be packed in A4 boxes, larger art (A3) will be carefully rolled in proper poster tubes.

    OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

    I understand that some of you are not able to support this comic book by contributing money. That's OK! One of the most important ways you can support this project is by sharing this campaign with your friends and other passionate comic book fans! Please show your support by sharing on Twitter, Instagram, Reddit, Facebook, or any other social media platforms that can help us get the word out!

story:
SAMSARA SAGA begins... 

For 2 millennia, the sovereign system of Dylae had been locked in a brutal conflict with the conquering Kait Armada until an advanced alien race calling themselves the Vyzemun suddenly appeared. It didn’t take long for these seemingly benevolent, alien drifters to overpower both sides and eventually settle the fighting among them. 

This event is known to all throughout the Galaxy as the Halting.  

Our story starts almost 1,000 after the Halting. To mark the millennial anniversary, a celebration of stellar proportions will occur to usher in the new age of galactic prosperity. 

Now, the Vyzemun serve the galaxy as mediators and benefactors to all beings. As inhabitants recover from their severe case of galactic PTSD, they begin to expand their territory. For a thousand years, the Dylae and Kait have coexisted by never stepping foot in the others' quadrant of the galaxy. But with colonial expansion leading ever outward, even the Vyzemun are having trouble keeping tabs on everyone. 

Enter the Primordial Epoch... 

Traverse the cosmos, in a storybook space opera from the collaborative minds of Ruel Deguzman and Christopher Harris (Xenobrane Studios). SAMSARA SAGA is a romp-n-stomp, science-fantasy graphic novel. It's filled with all our favorite aspects of sci-fi, joined with all the trimmings that make us smile thinking about the fantasy genre. 

On the surface SAMSARA SAGA is a fun, witty, dramatic, action-packed space opera set in a galaxy shrouded in star dust. We’ll have a variety of life-forms, planets, magic and science! We took our favorite elements of Sci-fi and Fantasy and merged them into a holy union of awesome. For example we have a magic wielding race called the Dylaed coexisting with cybernetic beings called Vyzemun.

Are you tired of not getting enough blood-magic?!

Ever find yourself wondering what a talking fungal life form would look like?!

Wish to splice up the whole cybernetic modified organics deal?!

If you said yes to all these questions, then SAMSARA SAGA is for you!

Like the title implies, this will be a SAGA. If you’re unfamiliar with the word “samsara” |səmˈsärə|, it’s basically the repeating cycle of birth, life and death…. In that order. We took this concept and applied it to our favorite types of stories. Our project, SAMSARA SAGA, is the direct result of the melding of our minds. The theme of SAMSARA is an amalgamation of experiences all connected by multiple threads, unified by the singular concept of change. 

With SAMSARA SAGA, sparks of an expansive series ignite. What comes next is a multi-verse born from the imagination bang! 


  What You Get From Us...

                                    ...What We Get From You

 
With your contribution we will provide you access to digital copies of the SAMSARA SAGA Comic Book. But that's not all, here's what's available:

  • SAMSARA SAGA: Birth (digitial comic) complete or in parts.

  • High Resolution Digital Promo Poster(s).

  • Desktop Wallpaper(s)

  • High Resolution Story cards: get to know the story behind the story & enjoy additional art in hi-def

  • Bonus Behind the Scenes Content - we'll gradually compile elements of the production process and give you access.

   Whether you're scoping our project out, interested in some light reading, or anticipating the start of our SAGA, we want to make sure you get your money's worth & hopefully even more. Our goal is to give you the maximum value for your contributions.  
Your donations will allow us the time to produce SAMSARA SAGA. You'll also enable us to purchase improved software and hardware tools.

Some things we need: 

1.Time primarily, funding helps us to keep the lights on and pay some bills. The current amount gives us just enough time (approximately 3-4 months) to complete the first 'Phase' called BIRTH. 

2. Software Licences:  Manga Studio EX, Photoshop, Z-Brush & Keyshot

Some things we could use, should we surpass our funding goal:

1. Updated workstations (currently using an i7 920 workstation)

-The goal is to build a current gen i7 or Xeon workstation with ample RAM & a faster workstation graphics processor. The current machine will be turned into a 3D scene rendering station.

2. An updated laptop & a Wacom for Chris Harris. He also draws.

These items will enhance our ability to create, increase our efficiency & improve the final results by letting us creatively push more capable equipment.

Other Possibilities:

We'd also love to  release a full a hard cover graphic novel & should we get enough funding we'll set up the appropriate perks so everyone can upgrade instead of having to increase their donations disproportionately.

Print out posters, shirts, bookmarks & more - based on what everyone's into.


The Impact

   We've been inspired by this digital age to creatively blend engaging storytelling with highly detailed 2d/3d compositions. 

 Not only are we launching this campaign for SAMSARA SAGA, we're also launching our careers. It’s a big step for us! One we believe we’re ready for. We hope that you’ll be a part of our journey!

 With your help, over time, we would like to create works that entertain & inspire people of all ages. Our goal is to explore various mediums such as: video games, interactive web content, motion graphics, educational apps, 3D printing, toys, collectibles & more. 

Risks & Challenges

  We began working on SAMSARA SAGA just 2 months ago and in that short time, have created this unique world filled with only a few known inhabitants. After realizing we had something special, we knew we had to share this with you.
We have just enough equipment to continue creating comics as we're doing now. Our main obstacle is simply affording the time to produce, as well as the need for  resources to expand to more ambitious projects. Other than funding, the sky (and beyond) is the limit. We believe we're capable creators & we look forward to what the future holds.

Alternative ways to Contribute

We know that some of you won't be able to contribute... but that doesn't mean you can't be a part of our journey. 

If you've made your way to our campaign page and you like what you see, please spread the word. It's as easy as clicking the indiegogo follow button, ot the share button to alert your friends, family or anyone you know that would love to read our story.  Don't worry... we'll do the rest after that!

You can also:

  • Visit Xenobrane.com to get more information about us or SAMSARA SAGA!
  • We'll be updating our campaign regularly. So stop by more than once!
  • Follow us on Twitter for real time updates!
  • Give us feedback, we'd love to hear from you!

The Impact
   We've been inspired by this digital age to creatively blend engaging storytelling with highly detailed 2d/3d compositions. 


 Not only are we launching this campaign for SAMSARA SAGA, we're also launching our careers. It’s a big step for us! One we believe we’re ready for. We hope that you’ll be a part of our journey!
 With your help, over time, we would like to create works that entertain & inspire people of all ages. Our goal is to explore various mediums such as: video games, interactive web content, motion graphics, educational apps, 3D printing, toys, collectibles & more. 
Risks & Challenges


  We began working on SAMSARA SAGA just 2 months ago and in that short time, have created this unique world filled with only a few known inhabitants. After realizing we had something special, we knew we had to share this with you.

We have just enough equipment to continue creating comics as we're doing now. Our main obstacle is simply affording the time to produce, as well as the need for  resources to expand to more ambitious projects. Other than funding, the sky (and beyond) is the limit. We believe we're capable creators & we look forward to what the future holds.


Alternative ways to Contribute We know that some of you won't be able to contribute... but that doesn't mean you can't be a part of our journey. 
If you've made your way to our campaign page and you like what you see, please spread the word. It's as easy as clicking the indiegogo follow button, ot the share button to alert your friends, family or anyone you know that would love to read our story.  Don't worry... we'll do the rest after that!
You can also:

Visit Xenobrane.com to get more information about us or SAMSARA SAGA!

We'll be updating our campaign regularly. So stop by more than once! Follow us on Twitter for real time updates!
Give us feedback, we'd love to hear from you!

story:
Short Summary

When Vladamir Putin decides to implement his own version of the NSA spying program, Edward Snowden's security is put at risk.  Ecuadorian officials offer asylum, but getting there may be trouble as the NSA wishes to shut up Snowden once and for all. Can the Voluntaryists get Snowden to safety in time before the governments get to him? Join us in this epic battle to expose invasive government spying as the Voluntaryists take on the NSA in their most daring adventure yet! The Voluntaryists versus the NSA!

  • HISTORY: Voluntaryist was created by liberty fanatic and costumer Jaime Sherman, whose passion for liberty is only matched by his passion for cosplay photography. He began the long process of creating the series while trudging through his graduate studies.

  • GOAL: To get The Voluntaryists versus the NSA in digital copy and print to share with you, and, eventually, the world via a free download.

  • PAGE COUNT: 18-22 new pages estimated for a 100% funded campaign.

We will produce as much of the comic as we can get funded for! The storyline may be adjusted to tailor to the funding level.


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise about $6,000 to get this comic’s potential fully going.

The expenses are largely for the cost of hiring artists to produce the comic and the expenses associated with putting the comic into print format. 
 

You can support us by making a contribution on the right-hand side by Credit Card/Debit Card or Paypal.

In addition, you can redeem perks for your support such as:

--->$2 – A personal “thank-you” will be made by having your name read among others in a Youtube video. (Aliases are permitted but must be specifically stated and PG rated.)

--->$6– A Voluntaryist sticker mailed to you. Make sure you provide your correct mailing address to receive this.

--->$10 – The DIGITAL COMIC in .pdf format early release. - Make sure you provide your correct e-mail to receive this.

--->$15 Sticker + Comic in .pdf format - A Voluntaryist sticker mailed to you + the Comic in .pdf format. Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this.

--->$20 Desktop Wallpaper + Comic in .pdf – Receive a Voluntaryists desktop wallpaper for your computer background. Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this.

--->$25 Comic .pdf + ArtCards The DIGITAL COMIC in .pdf format early release + (2) 4x6 inch Voluntaryist artcards. Make sure you provide your correct e-mail to receive this.

--->$35– Signed PRINT COPY of the comic. - Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this.

--->$50 Comic + Button + Sticker The signed Snowden comic, a button, and a sticker mailed to you. Make sure you provide your correct mailing address to receive this. International supporters add $5 USD.

--->$60 – Signed Zombies & NSA Issue Receive a signed Saving Snowden: The Voluntaryists Vversus the NSA and a signed print copy of the Voluntaryists Versus Statist Zombies comic. International supporters add $10 USD.

--->$75 - Signed Comic + Mug Signed PRINT COPY of the comic AND a Voluntaryist comic coffee mug. - Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this. International supporters add $10 USD.

--->$100 All 4 Issues Signed Receive a signed #1 Special Edition, a signed copy of the Voluntaryists Versus Statist Zombies, a signed Voluntaryists Versus the TSA, and a signed Saving Snowden: The Voluntaryists versus The NSA. Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this. International supporters add $12 USD.

--->$100 Voluntaryist Tee Get a Voluntaryist T-Shirt + comic in .pdf form! Choose a color (Red, Black, White) and a character (Voluntaryist or Voluntaria). Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this. International supporters add $20 USD.

--->$200 –½ page Ad Sponsor - ½ page Ad Sponsor -Get an advertisement (PG-13 rated) for half a comic page. (Limited to 2 Sponsors) Receive a signed printed copy of the comic. Must provide shipping address to receive comic. International supporters add $10 USD for comic.

--->$300 3D Printed & Hand Painted Figure Get your unique Voluntaryist or Voluntaria 3D printed and hand-painted figure made comic in print format. Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this. International buyers must pay for shipping costs.

--->$350 ACTION FIGURE IN PACKAGING Get your unique Voluntaryist team action figure made by the talented Short Fuse Media Group with custom packaging + comic in .pdf format. Choose from Voluntaryist, Voluntaria, AnCat, or Mack Lee. Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this. International buyers must pay for shipping costs.

--->$500 Cover Appearance Have you ever wanted to experience comic form? Get illustrated and appear in the issue with guns blazing on the cover! Also receive a print copy of the comic. Make sure you provide your correct mailing address and e-mail to receive this. (NOTE: Final design and implementation final design is subject to our approval. We will do our best to make it great!)

--->$1000 Voluntaryist SuperSuit + Comic Have you ever wanted to suit up for liberty? Now you can with a custom Voluntaryist zentai suit. You will receive your very own custom-tailored Voluntaryist hero suit as well as the signed comic. You will need to provide your measurements to receive the tailoring. A sizing guide will be provided. Make sure you put down your mailing address to receive this perk.

While the comic is a fictional storyline, our hope is that the comic is something that goes beyond its entertainment value. We would like the comic to get into the hands of people who are unfamiliar with the NSA's spying and the current state of affairs. We want to wake people up to Voluntaryism and truly-free living using the comic medium because it breaks traditional genre barriers.

PUBLIC RELEASE:

We will be releasing the comic to download for free eventually, but those who paid to get the comic e-mailed or printed will receive it FIRST and will receive the comic about a month AHEAD of everyone else.

SO, with that in mind, don’t be shy about supporting at the $2 or $6 levels because EVERY dollar counts to making the comic come into existence. That we need you to be our hero for

<-----Sample Comic Page from The Voluntaryists VS. the TSA----->

<-----Sample Comic Page from The Voluntaryists VS. the TSA----->

STRETCH GOALS!

If we raise more than $1,500 ABOVE the goal, we will do an animated reading of the comic to post on YouTube.

If we raise more than $3,000 above the goal, we will create more 3D printed action figure perks with new characters and fund a batch of figures to be distributed to contributors who give at the $50+ level. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't have pocket change to spare, you can still help us get the message out by sharing our campaign and sharing our videos on YouTube.

Use the indiegogo.com share tools to let others know and visit our pages here:

FACEBOOK:http://www.facebook.com/sire.voluntary

YOUTUBE:http://youtube.com/thevoluntaryists

WEBSITE:http://volcomic.com

Share Tweets about the campaign with: #SAVINGSNOWDEN

ALSO! Please make sure you give us your proper address for whatever perk you redeem. If you have any questions, please direct them to Jaime at mr.voluntary@gmail.com. 

READ THE FIRST & SECOND ISSUES FOR FREE: http://voluntaryists.wordpress.com/free-comic-download/

Bitcoin support information.*

1Nc1Futa9SczeyE2cJo5ryr8Ruy4jqyXLT

*Note – contributions through Bitcoin are for gifts made to the comic project only and are NOT tax deductible.

And that’s all there is to it. ( :

story:
Are you a Comics Fan and think the Comic Industry is way to expensive? How much do you spend every week on Comic Books? $10, $20, $50 dollars? And still you wish you could buy more Comic Books than the ones that you can afford? This happened to us, and we came up with a Brilliant idea to offer the community: A Comic Book Streaming Service!

We introduce you:  

Like every Streaming Service, you just have to Pay a Very Cheap Subscription that can be billed weekly, monthly, or yearly, and then you will have access to all the latest Releases of your Favorite Publishers in a Clean, easy to use Digital format that simulates a real Comic Book! That is beautifully viewed on any Tablet, Laptop, Desktop, Smartphone, and even Smart TV!  You can even download our Desktop Reader, and save your Digital Comic Books in your computer!

With a continually growing Comic Library, get your weekly dose of Comic Books at a VERY affordable price!


View and Read your Comic Books in this Intuitive and Easy to Use Interface, featuring High Quality Images so you never miss any detail of your favorite Comics! Zoom, take Screen Shots, and take all the advantages that the Digital Media can offer to you Reading Experience!

Some of our 

                               


For those of you reading on your smartphone, try them on your Desktop/Laptop for some Cool Extra Features!


ComicStream Features:

  • Pay only a fraction of what you pay today for Comic Books.
  • Read ALL the comics you can!
  • Enjoy HD Digital Comic Books.
  • Read Comics on you Desktop/Laptop, Tablet, Smartphone, and Smart TV!
  • Download and keep the Comics you want and Read them on your Computer with our Desktop Reader.
  • Zoom in.
  • Take Screenshots of your favorite Superheroes!
  • Take advantage of all the features that Digital Media can provide!

 Desktop/Laptop View:


Desktop/Laptop View (Zoomed In):


Desktop/Laptop Interface Video:



Desktop Reader (Where you can Download and Keep your Comics!): 



Tablet View: 


Smartphone View: 


Tablet/Smartphone Interface Video: 




Readers:

33-47% Discount on 1-3 Year Subscription! Read ALL The Comics you can for just $40-50 a year! Including the latest Releases from all your favorite Comic Publishers! Retail Price will be $75 after this Campaign.
Estimated Delivery: June 2015.

Retailers: 

3-Month to 5-Year Retailer Services: Do you have a Comic Book Store and want to offer Digital Comics? Or even if you don't have a Store and want to start one, this is your Best Choice!  Unlike any other Retailer Service, HERE you KEEP  100% of the Revenue! Offer Digital Comics as a Streaming Service or Sell them separately! Your Choice! Every week we will give you the links to the Latest Digital Comics so you can implement them on your web page. Get 10-50% off when you buy a longer term service!
Estimated Delivery: June 2015.

$6.000: When we get here, we will start a Referral Contest, and the Contributor who has the most Contributors Referred by the end of the Campaign, will win a brand NEW Deluxe Sideshow Wonder Woman Statue! (The one featured in our video!). $399 value.


The person with the second highest referral number will win this amazing Sideshow Black Widow Age of Ultron Premium Statue!  $219 Value. (Ships Nov 2015).



We need your help!

Contributions will be used to improve the software used for the 3D Digital Comic Books, as well as upgrades to the servers that will host them. This will be directly proportional to the number of contributions we get. Also, they will cover expenses made while negotiating with DC, Marvel, Image, and many other Comic Publishers.There is always the risk that negotiations with these publishers take longer than expected, and that's why we need your contribution! If we can show them what an Amazing system we have, and that we have the Comic Book Fan Community Support, we can make this Dream come True! So tell your friends and family, and lets make this a reality!

story:
Who I am and what this is about

Demon Wings

My name is Christina (Kiki) Godek, I'm 23, and I've always wanted to be a comic artist. I originally came up with a comic idea, The Academy, back in 2009. It never came out the way I wanted, so to pass time while my friend worked on it with me, I decided to make a backstory for one of the characters, a succubus named Leandra. It helped me flesh her out as a character, and helped my art improve. 

The story follows Leandra, who doesn't want to live in her realm anymore because she can't go through with all of the sadistic actions that the other demons do normally. She has a little sister type friend, Candy, who becomes more sadistic as Leandra becomes empathetic, and Dagger, a mysterious succubus who seems to aid them, but doesn't fully seem on their side. It is a mature story, however, with violence and graphic content, intended for people 16 and older.

I've always wanted a physical copy of a book I made to hold, and that's what I want to do. 

Helping me are my two best friends, Hugh Otterson, and (formerly known as Cygnus) Rin. Rin is basically a professional artist, but with his cancer, it's hard for him to work or find work. I wanted to include him to give him a job of sorts and be able to pay him for helping me. He helps with promotional art, coloring, and digitally inking. None of this would be possible without him.

What I Need & What You Get

I set my goal for $1000, but if it could get more, that would be great! The money I receive from the funds would go towards printing the books, shipping them to people, and making extra goodies for the higher tiers. If there was anything left after everything was taken care of, that money is going to Rin to help with his hospital bills. I haven't been able to pay him much for his help, so I want to make up for it if I can.

Even if I don't make it to $1000, I'll still use everything to print, ship out the books to people who donated, and send their tier perks. I will also be printing additional books to take to some indie comic book stores to sell.

The book will also include the original strips I made for when I first started Demon Wings, along with original artwork, concept art, fanart, and more. The comic is on a weekly update status, so the book will contain pages that won't be released for weeks, even months. You'll get the whole story at once! I'm also adding extra pages to the story that will expand on what happened between Candy and Leandra when they first met, and will help tie the old plot and the new plot together.

Tier Perks:

$5: Your name will be added to the Thank You page in the back of the book for all of the contributors and a print of promo artwork. (All higher tiers will automatically have your name in it)

$10: You will receive a copy of the book, signed with a personal thank you from me.

$15: You will receive a signed copy of the book, along with prints of original artwork, and buttons of Leandra, Candy, and Dagger.

$25: You will receive a signed copy of the book, the prints, the buttons, and a personal sketch of Leandra for you, however you want me to draw her, and a note from me.

$50: You will receive a signed copy of the book, the prints, the buttons, and I will draw a picture of you as a demon, and also incorporate it into the story.

$100: You will receive a signed copy of the book, the prints, the buttons, a cameo as a demon, and a photo of my cat with the book and my Leandra plushies, signed with his name on the back.

How this will help my comic

Making an IndieGogo will help spread the word of my comic immensely and hopefully bring some new readers. I have an important story to tell and I want people to enjoy it. It will also help build up the story to my other comic, Life's An Academy, which I hope to publish at a later date.

You can still help even if you can't contribute

Even if you don't have the money to donate, you can still help me by spreading the word and referring people to my comic and my IndieGogo. I want it to be a popular story.

$5: Your name will be added to the Thank You page in the back of the book for all of the contributors and a print of promo artwork. (All higher tiers will automatically have your name in it)
$10: You will receive a copy of the book, signed with a personal thank you from me.
$15: You will receive a signed copy of the book, along with prints of original artwork, and buttons of Leandra, Candy, and Dagger.
$25: You will receive a signed copy of the book, the prints, the buttons, and a personal sketch of Leandra for you, however you want me to draw her, and a note from me.
$50: You will receive a signed copy of the book, the prints, the buttons, and I will draw a picture of you as a demon, and also incorporate it into the story.
$100: You will receive a signed copy of the book, the prints, the buttons, a cameo as a demon, and a photo of my cat with the book and my Leandra plushies, signed with his name on the back.   How this will help my comic Making an IndieGogo will help spread the word of my comic immensely and hopefully bring some new readers. I have an important story to tell and I want people to enjoy it. It will also help build up the story to my other comic, Life's An Academy, which I hope to publish at a later date.
    You can still help even if you can't contribute Even if you don't have the money to donate, you can still help me by spreading the word and referring people to my comic and my IndieGogo. I want it to be a popular story.

story:
"Beka Barry is a force of nature.  I have watched her do comedy that holds audiences rapt with her incredible ability to tell a story that intermingles her struggle, pain, laughter, and resilience.  She puts on a show that makes you feel more human and connected.  I can draw more comparisons.  There is no one quite like Beka." - Danielle K. Gregoire  www.comedywomb.com

"The best competition set in the history of competitions!" - Seattle International Comedy Competition

Beka Barry is a professional female comic with 17 years of stand-up experience. She was voted "Northwest's Hottest Newcomer" in 1999, was seen on Nick@Night's "Funniest Mom in America 2", and was recently reviewed for her one-woman drama "Stockholm Syndrome" as being "deceptively intricate!". She was best PTA popcorn chairperson in the history of the world.She took the last nine years off to care for her amazing, brilliant daughter with progressing Behcet's Disease www.abda.org. Now that her daughter is turning 18 and can care for herself and go to the doctor all the time without needing a parent there, Beka is READY to get out on the road and make people laugh!
HENCE!!
"THE DIRTIEST MOM IN AMERICA COMEDY TOUR!!"
The Dirtiest Mom in America comedy Tour" is a brash, uncompromising, and unapologetic view of the joys of parenting and becoming a real grown-up through the trials and tribulations that our everyday life demands. Veteran parents will relate to her unpolished experiences, and those without kids will have a face sore from laughing from WAYYY too much information.
The tour will consist of multiple "legs", with a return to home base in Seattle in between to keep an eye on er daughter.

"The dirtiest mom in America is well-worth the price of a babysitter!" - Brian McKim editor Sheckymagazine.com

YOUR GENEROUS DONATION WILL PAY FOR WEBSITE AND TRAVEL COSTS.

story:
Marino 2016

I'm comedian Mike Marino. After touring the country for 20 years and guest appearances on many late night talk shows, it was my joke about having an Italian President from New Jersey, on Byron Allen's Comics Unleashed, that went viral. 

So now I am answering the call! Marino 2016 is my web series following me on my epic journey to the White House as I am going around the country and the world get votes. 

To collect votes and laughs, we so desperately need $5,000 to shoot another 10 episodes of Marino 2016 and keep the journey going. We have guest appearances lined up with famous people and people from your neighborhood! 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $5,000 for the production of 10 (or possibly more) additional episodes of Marino 2016. The money will go to location, equipment, and other production costs (like talent, food, props, etc.). 
  • Even if we don't reach the full goal of $5,000, we will continue making videos until the money runs out! 
  • Check out the awesome perks you will receive if you support my campaign, ranging from bumper stickers to t-shirts and cameos on the series! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate any money, here are some other ways you can help support Marino 2016:

  • Share the campaign via social media and email. 
  • Subscribe and share the Youtube channel and current episodes:www.youtube.com/c/mikemarinolive 
  • Spread the word with #Marino2016

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

This is a passion project for Dominic Riggio, long-time pro wrestling fan (he was in attendance for wrestlemania 3 and 23) comic book writer (The Arcane Awakening graphic novel triliogy, and Donnybrook, and "Rowdy" Roddy Piper The Kilted Avenger) and owner of Mess Bucket Comics, the publisher for this comic series. 

Erik Hodson is the illustrator of this comic. Erik is known for his fantastic wrestling art depicting wrestlings's biggest stars in classic comic book covers. Erik has provided exclusive artwork for Mick Foley as well as Highspots.com. 

This book will be distributed through Pro Wrestling Tees and has been approved by Roddy's widow Kitty Toombs (Kitty also appears in the book).

This is much more than an independent comic book series with incredible distribution from Pro Wrestling Tees. This is a a way of preserving Roddy's career in the most fun way possible. To quote Kitty "You can't keep a good man down!"

In the  video you heard  from many wrestling legends like Buff Bagwell, The Blue Meanie, Lanny Poffo, Cheeseburger, Colt Cabana, Victoria, Teddy Long, and much  more content released on social media in the future!

What We Need & What You Get

Dominic and Erik have been grinding away on the Independent comic con circuit for nearly a decade and all over the country. They have given up an incredible amount of time, money and "normal job" careers to pursue a dream  to make a living with their art. This opportunity is of the highest importance to bring you a fun and deserving Roddy Piper story... but more importantly Erik and Dom are true fans of Roddy.

 

The Impact

 

Your contribution to this campaign is extremely important to the survival of this great series. We have a fun universe full of stories that we'd love to tell you about but we can't do that without your support!

Erik and Dom have sold thousands of books and art pieces all over the country that has given them incredible opportunities... like this one. This type of success is only possible when a writer and an illustrator have the passion, drive and talent to pull it off.

Risks & Challenges

This project is a great challenge for Erik and Dom. These two guys have many projects already on their plates, 25-30 comic conventions across the  country, and the pressure of making this book loved by Roddy's millions of fans. 

We understand that money may be tight for many of you and you can't contribute to the  campaign. In that case, please send this to your friends: that love Roddy Piper, that love pro wrestling, that love Indie comics, that have too much money and need to store it somewhere safe. Share this on social media. Long Live "Rowdy" Roddy Piper!!!!

 

STRETCH GOAL #1: $9,000

An 11x17 Roddy Piper print from DC Comics and Marvel Comics artist Gus Vazquez. Gus is a 25+ year veteran in the comic book industry as a penciller. Gus has worked on such titles as the following: Deadpool, JLA, Green Arrow, Suicide Squad, The Flash, Spider-man, Sunfire and Big Hero 6. If we reach this stretch goal, EVERYONE that buys a perk will get a signed copy of this print!

 

Stretch Goal #2: $11,500

An 11x17 Roddy Piper print by comic book legend Arvell Jones. Arvell Jones has worked on countless Marvel and DC titles dating back to 1975 like the following: Thor, Iron Man, Luke Cage, The Avengers, Captain America, Daredevil, Superman and much more. If we reach this stretch goal, EVERYONE that buys a perk will get a signed copy of this print!

story:
Hey There!

For those of you that do not know Zone Komics, my name is Diogo Mané and I'm the Director and Founder of ZK. Let me introduce myself a bit better, I'm a 23 year old athlete (basketball of course!) with a degree in Graphic Design and Production here in Portugal. There have always been two things I remember doing my whole life: Comics and Sports. My two passions let's put it that way. Since I was a little kid I was always fascinated by carefully built fantasy universes like Lord of the Rings, Naruto, Star Wars, the Marvel & DC Universe, just to name a few. And like any kid, I always dreamed of building one of my own. And that’s why we're here!

Four years ago I started to create a universe called No Place For Heroes, where all of my comics would take place and relate to each other. A world with magic and advanced technology, but that followed a hard set of rules and limitations so that it would feel as real as possible. My dream Universe seemed far away to achieve when in January 2018 new members started to join my journey, today we're over 15 people and have completed the first issue of three titles and have 3 more in production. The World that is No Place For Heroes is ready to come forward to the public and make its debut.

The start of the No Place For Heroes Universe is marked by the release of its first 3 titles: Full Blaze, Rogue Dragon and Warper! Each set in different spaces and years but linked in fate.

Let's go over each one a bit, shall we?

In Full Blaze you find yourself in a guild of mercenaries, or as we call them Sellswords, who sell their skills to complete quests issued by the people or government. Some can be violent and pretty dangerous others quite boring, nonetheless they're paid for it. You'll be accompanying the crew of Aaron Stryker, a noticeable captain in the ranks of Full Blaze, leader to a young promising team of Sarah Moon and Xander Fair. Their quest is to transport a dangerous fugitive back to Whitebridge, Azure's Kingdom capitol, during a rainy night over Paramisian where the risks are many.

Ever heard of an origin story? Well, that's exactly what Rogue Dragon is. The story takes us to the farmlands of Orthyrst, a magnificent and balanced country, where a young girl named Marayah is getting sick of her everyday life, knowing that there's something more out there calling for her. This seems all pretty fair, but things get complicated when you have some powers you can't quite explain and the farm starts to feel really small.

Ok, what's your favorite superpower? Mine? Teleportation! And that's what I gave Drake, the main character of Warper! He's able to warp the space-time continuum giving him the ability to teleport short distances with the aid of any object. We're introduced to his story, that's set a couple years after Rogue Dragon #1, when him and his loyal partner Jahne are providing additional escort to the Royal Skyship "Lady Varganthia III". It seemed a quiet ride for the first 5 hours, and as usual Drake was bored, however soon enough things were about to escalate to a level they weren't ready for.

Here's what we need to make this happen & of course what you get for making it possible!

To bring the No Place For Heroes into the light we need at least 800€, that will be divided this way: 300€ for printing 100 copies of our first three titles that will be displayed and available for our official launch, 200€ for marketing purposes (designs, website expenses, prints of promotional material), 150€ for compensation of our work pulling this event together, 100€ for additional expenses such as gas, materials, tools, etc. and finally 50€ to cover for the Indiegogo and bank fees. And that's all there is to it, by helping this project in its initial boost you'll be bringing the rest of the No Place For Heroes Universe closer to life. We're not looking for a funding that we'll pay us a large amount of money or anything, just something to get us going and we'll take it from there.

To reward you for backing our project we have some unique Perks that you can choose from, some are bundle items that you can get for a higher discount here on Indiegogo, others are exclusive items that we'll be only available on our supporting campaigns and Official Launch. Be sure to check them out!

Be the change we want to see in the World

In a world where the comic book industry is ruled by the superhero genre, No Place For Heroes aims to bring the same kind of excitement and entangled storytelling that Superheroes Universes have, but in a totally different setting. A refreshing new world, with new laws of physics and magic to discover, new history, new backgrounds, all supported by a sound rule and limitation system to make it believable. For us being believable is key, we try to bring practicality and functionality to our designs and storytelling to make our world much more immersive and appealing, with high focus on the story at hand, which we believe to be essential to every good comic book.

Everyone can show their Support!

We understand, even though a lot of people would love this project, not everyone can contribute to it. That's why we're here to tell you that there's always a way to make a difference and show us and our community your support. By following us in our social media and sharing our content and also this campaign you're already helping us go forward. Every single one of you counts.

We're just truly grateful for checking our project and we're sure you'll love it just as much as we loved doing it. My name is Diogo Mané and until next time... Stay In The Zone!

story:
My name is Emilio Rodriguez and I am the founder of Tres Calaveras Studios, a studio dedicated to creating worlds that people are going to want to be a part of and share with others.  It is also the aim of the studio to introduce some much-needed diversity to comics and comic concepts.  However, it is not enough to have characters or creators that are diverse - one must endeavor to produce quality while promoting diversity.  After all, diversity without quality is merely a book with a minority character. 

I am an attorney and a college professor who has always possessed an ardent love for comics, and have read and written them since my earliest years.  This campaign is important to me because I wish to create a world that people are going to want to be a part of and share with others.  It is also important to me to help show the genre is capable of depth and character development that can stand against any other. 

The risks are few because the book is done for a debut at the NY Comic Con in October 2016.  Therefore, those who pledge are not going to have to wait long for their rewards.  My studio has put out three issues of a series called Sara Rising, also a sci-fi series; therefore we know what goes into completing a book and getting it out to the public.       

The funding needed is $5500.  This money is going to the artistic/lettering team for finishing the book.  Additional funds will go to publishing costs, Indiegogo fees, and marketing costs. 

Some of the cool perks offered are commissions of ANY character desired by the pledgor (even characters not part of this campaign) by two of the most noted artists in the field: Mike Lilly (Nightwing, Black Terror, Madness of Wonderland) and Paris Cullins (Blue Beetle).  

Even if you can't contribute, you can help by spreading the word and making some raucous noise about the campaign.  We don't do this to create in a vacuum.  We do it to bring joy, creativity, and a damn good story to the world. Thanks everyone!

story:
40-Pages of Funny, Zany and Exciting Adventures For All Ages from Award Winning Legendary Artist Vic Guiza! 

Shipping Worldwide September 2020.  Proudly Printed in Canada.

         

SHIBA SQUAD™ 
The Comic Book Series - Issue #1

Shiba Squad™ - the Comic Series - Issue #1 has 40 pages and a soft cover (for now). It is perfect bound. Perfect binding is formed when book pages are glued together at the spine. The cover is usually made from a thicker card stock and laminated or coated to protect the book. 

In this first spectacular issue you will ALSO get an original Sketchbook section (8 pages) showcasing the sketches of the humble beginnings of our Shiba Squad™ Shibaverse

The inside of the cover and back page are also detailed with the origin story and team details! 

Interior of Cover of Shiba Squad™ - The Comic Book -  Issue #1 

    

INTERIOR PAGE EXAMPLES:

In Issue #1 we find Max has just finished school and is off on a mission for class.  He has to catch an insect to bring back to class and ends up chasing a mischievous bee........he stumbles upon a secret gateway......


   ...which he tumbles down to find a secret laboratory!

   

                                                                                                            
....and soon Max will have to make a decision that will change his very destiny. 

     

Back of Shiba Squad™ - The Comic Book - Issue #1 

In the early years of the last century, a German Shepherd scientist, Dr. Lothar Dziatzko (or Dr. Z as he is known), escapes from Eastern Europe after he discovers the legendary magical crystals known as the “Toltec Crystals”. Landing in the city of Neo Kyoto, he built an advanced steampunk lab deep underneath his home to conduct scientific experiments.  Many may consider the lab to be antique junk now, but those machines are state of the art even today – 130 years later –because Dr. Z’s steampunk lab runs on the etheric energy from the Toltec crystals.

The modern setting for the story is Neo Kyoto, a bustling metropolis alongside the Pacific Ocean in the not so distant future.  It’s a city of peace and every day tranquility, but unbeknownst to its citizens there is a magical crystal buried underneath the city that holds the power to destroy the world or bring good to it.

Who will save this world you ask?

...Shiba Inu’s?  

Yes, Shiba Inu's! 

A new breed of heroes comes alive when seven teenage Shiba Inu friends tap into a new reality using a mythical technology that gives them tremendous abilities and unique powers, with magic Toltec Crystals as their main energy source. These high-tech heroes are the Shiba Squad™!


Shiba Squad™ is an original comic book series created by award winning artist Vic Guiza and a group of successful writers and friends that wanted to create animated content that represents where we are today and where we want to go in the future.  The idea was spawned by a need for purpose driven content, a nostalgia for comic books, and a love for Shiba Inu dogs!  

The story follows a group of young Shiba’s living in Neo Kyoto™ navigating their way through school and regular household chores.  One day, a young red Shiba Inu dog, named Maximus aka "Max", the protagonist of the story, finds an abandoned tree house, which happens to be the secret emergency exit of Dr. Z’s underground laboratory.

This lab contains high tech suits and gadgets that Max and his friends use to take on villains threatening the safety of Neo Kyoto™.  From here, a superhero team is formed fighting monsters large enough to crush skyscrapers and small enough to inhabit the realm of cyberspace!

Shiba Squad™ author Matthew breakdowns our "WHY". 

 

"The Call" - Maximus, the real life Shiba Inu, assembles an Allstar Team! 

 

The Entire Theatrical Version 

 

THE PRIZES

We offer a number of different prizes.  These range from either a print or digital copy of the first edition of the comic, to crazy cool limited edition Shiba Squad™ merchandise!

Digital or Physical copy of Shiba Squad™

       
Issue #1 - 40 Pages including 8 pages of Original Sketches - Perfect Bound

Inside Cover - Sample Page 
    

Shiba Squad™ Limited Edition Stickers & Cut Outs 
                    

Limited Edition Shiba Squad™ Concept Art
(3 Prints)

Below are three concept art prints which will be 6.63 X 10.25 inches in size. 

   
Suited Up Maximus defends Neo Kyoto from the Giant Cockroachzilla

   
Max's Adventures Have Begun

   

Concept Art of the Origin of Cockroachzilla


Variant Cover Prize

What is a variant? In comic books, a variant cover (sometimes variant edition) refers to an issue of a comic book printed with multiple covers, each with unique cover art. Variant covers are a large part of comic book collecting with each cover giving readers something new to collect. ... Their argument is that it is just another way for the publishers to get readers to purchase the same comic multiple times.

You will receive a variant cover issue (40 pages) as a prize. 

   

Second Possible Variant 
  


Shiba Squad™ Limited Edition Trading Cards

                          

                                                     

                                                     

                                                     

                                                     

         

                              

 

 

Shiba Squad™ Limited Edition Sketchbook #1

Dive deep into the emerging Shibaverse! Vic Guiza's Shiba Squad™ Sketchbook #1 transports you to the detailed world of the Shiba Squad™.  Here you get to explore Max, the Shiba Squad™, their Secret Lab, their vehicles, magical mysterious crystals and futuristic ShibaTech sketch work unveiled! 

    Below is a potential variant Sketchbook #1 Cover. 

    

Example Pages of Sketch Book- Issue #1

   

      

  

The Sketchbook will have detailed sketches of technology in the Shiba Squad™ HQ. 

   



COMING SOON PRIZES
SHIBA SQUAD™ T-SHIRTS




THE TIMELINE

    



Shiba Squad™ was originally created by award winning artist, Vic Guiza.  Vic, the original Creativologist, has been working with illustration and animation for over 33 years. He has worked in marketing campaigns, animation, and on comic books with global companies and iconic brands from 16 countries including: The Simpsons, Disney, Marvel Comics, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Kellogg ́s and Frito-Lay, among others. 


                             

Vic’s experience is inspiring, but he has never had the chance to venture into his own independent comic book project.  Shiba Squad™ The Comic book series is this chance for Vic.

He conceptualized the artwork himself beginning with simple concept sketches:

                

And culminating in the beautiful Concept art that represents Shiba Squad™:
  

Matthew breathes life into the Shiba Squad™ by writing the story.  Matthew has been writing fiction since his early 20s. He published his first fantasy-adventure novel in 2012 while he was still in college.  Since then, he has published an online cartoon series and writes and produces a new theatre play annually.  

 

 

 



 

Filip loves to plan, and with over 15 years of experience in business and professional services, he was keen to bring out his creative side and help his long-time friend Jay, to ensure this story is a success.







Maximus, The Real Life Shiba Inu, is the inspiration for Maximus aka Max", our Hero in Shiba Squad™- The Comic Book Series.

 

 

 




Jay is the creative visionary of the team.  With over 20 years of award winning experience building brands, Jay has assembled a world class team of Creativologists which has put together an impressive purpose-driven vision for Shiba Squad™. 





Jay and Vic have known each other for 13 years.  Jay, an avid lover of Shiba Inu dogs, wanted to produce a story about Shiba’s and his own dog Maximus, and Vic was finally ready to start his own comic book project, creating the concept for the story of Shiba Squad.  Together they brought Matthew on board as a writer and Filip to assist with the planning. Creativology Studios was formed as a result, and Shiba Squad™ is the team’s first project together.  Each member brings something different to the team, and all are experienced professionals. Our values are based on the principles of integrity, passion, hard-work and humor.

THE MESSAGE

This team came together under the shared ambition of creating purpose driven content that is also fun and adorable.  The comic book market is oversaturated with serious, edgy comics.

Shiba Squad™ takes its own approach.  It deals with issues that speak to all children, issues like self-esteem, weight, bullying, and diversity, but in an informative, responsible way. These issues are framed within a lighthearted and fun story! 

We are inspired by the comics and cartoons of our childhood and hope that you get that nostalgic feeling from just looking at Vic's art! 

Our mission is to create a world-class comic book (and eventually animated cartoon series) that captures the imagination of children, daring them to achieve their dreams, challenge their fears, and to fight against injustice, while always staying loyal to their friends and having fun together.

THE CAMPAIGN

The immediate priority is completing the first issue of Shiba Squad™.  The story line has been written and initial art concept for the first issue has already been created. 

Hitting our goal of $25,000 CAD, we will have the funds to finish, print and distribute Issue #1 of Shiba Squad™.

We have big ambitions for Max and the Shiba Squad™.  We would like to make more comics. 2 more future issues have already been written and we have plans for an extended story arc spanning multiple comic books. 

Beyond the comics, we would like to create a pilot for an animated cartoon series for Shiba Squad™!  We also have plans for a card game inspired by the Shiba Squad™ series.  These visions, however, are secondary to the immediate goals of producing the first issue. 

Our story finds our young hero, Maximus (a.k.a Max) living comfortably in Neo Kyoto.  His world of school and friends is about to be turned upside down forever! 

    

    

    
      

Cloud

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


In Issue #1 we are introduced briefly to Max's best friend, Cloud. A technical wizard, we will soon find out how Cloud's technical prowess and teamwork aids Max's understanding of Dr. Z's secret laboratory and mysterious technology. 


The Squad

Best Friends!  In Issue #1 we are introduced to Max's fellow Shiba Friends.  Over the course of the next few issues we will learn more about each character, how they join the Shiba Squad and what mysteries are unlocked in their individual exo-suits.

    

   

   

   
 

The Twins  - Thunder.......

         
..and Lightning 

         
Hawk! 

                

Prism 

            
Jazz 

          

Dr. Z

Who is Dr. Z?  Why did he abandon his laboratory filled with magical technology that appears to be from a different dimension? What powers his laboratory? Why did he build these exo-suits so long ago? 

    
    

The Villains
   Vincent


In Issue #1, you will be introduced to Vincent, a roguish cat in Neo Kyoto and his secretive family.  Vincent stumbles upon some unknown artifacts with mysterious energy.  How will this plot effect Neo Kyoto, only time well tell! 
    


Cockroachzilla


In Issue #1 of Shiba Squad, we will also explore the emergence of the Giant Insect known as Cockroachzilla.  What are his reasons for attacking Neo Kyoto?  How will Max stop him?  And how did Cockroachzilla get so darn big?

      

 

The Shibatech 

Maximus and the Shiba Squad™ will be uncovering world changing tech that adapts to their physiology as well as intellect.  Dr. Z left a laboratory of unknown origin and mythical power sources that may ultimately shed some light on basic string theory frameworks. Say What? 

   
 

     
    

  

 

  


Neo Kyoto 

In Shiba Squad™ - The Comic Book Series you will get to explore the sprawling technological marvel known as Neo Kyoto! 
   

   

   


PRIZE VARIANTS
Stickers 

   

                 


OUR PARTNERS 

PRINTING & SHIPPING
We have teamed up with veteran Toronto print and publishing company TLAC to print and distribute our comics worldwide. 

VIDEO PRODUCTION
Alfredo Films is a Toronto-based creative studio that produces long and short format content for broadcast, social media, and the web.

THANK YOU!

You have the Shiba In U!


We recognize that not everybody has the means to contribute money to the campaign.  We understand, and we appreciate your interest regardless! If you like what we are doing and you want to contribute in other ways, please share our cause on social media.  If you have any friends that are big comic or Shiba Inu fans, please let them know about Shiba Squad™!

    

If you are interested in being a brand ambassador please join us on www.facebook.com/ShibaSquadHQ and let us know!

  

Stretch Goals To be Announced!

40-Pages of Funny, Zany and Exciting Adventures For All Ages from Award Winning Legendary Artist Vic Guiza! Shipping Worldwide September 2020.  Proudly Printed in Canada.         
SHIBA SQUAD™ The Comic Book Series - Issue #1
Shiba Squad™ - the Comic Series - Issue #1 has 40 pages and a soft cover (for now). It is perfect bound. Perfect binding is formed when book pages are glued together at the spine. The cover is usually made from a thicker card stock and laminated or coated to protect the book. In this first spectacular issue you will ALSO get an original Sketchbook section (8 pages) showcasing the sketches of the humble beginnings of our Shiba Squad™ ShibaverseThe inside of the cover and back page are also detailed with the origin story and team details! Interior of Cover of Shiba Squad™ - The Comic Book -  Issue #1     INTERIOR PAGE EXAMPLES:In Issue #1 we find Max has just finished school and is off on a mission for class.  He has to catch an insect to bring back to class and ends up chasing a mischievous bee........he stumbles upon a secret gateway......   ...which he tumbles down to find a secret laboratory!                                                                                                               ....and soon Max will have to make a decision that will change his very destiny.      Back of Shiba Squad™ - The Comic Book - Issue #1 In the early years of the last century, a German Shepherd scientist, Dr. Lothar Dziatzko (or Dr. Z as he is known), escapes from Eastern Europe after he discovers the legendary magical crystals known as the “Toltec Crystals”. Landing in the city of Neo Kyoto, he built an advanced steampunk lab deep underneath his home to conduct scientific experiments.  Many may consider the lab to be antique junk now, but those machines are state of the art even today – 130 years later –because Dr. Z’s steampunk lab runs on the etheric energy from the Toltec crystals.The modern setting for the story is Neo Kyoto, a bustling metropolis alongside the Pacific Ocean in the not so distant future.  It’s a city of peace and every day tranquility, but unbeknownst to its citizens there is a magical crystal buried underneath the city that holds the power to destroy the world or bring good to it.Who will save this world you ask?...Shiba Inu’s?  Yes, Shiba Inu's! A new breed of heroes comes alive when seven teenage Shiba Inu friends tap into a new reality using a mythical technology that gives them tremendous abilities and unique powers, with magic Toltec Crystals as their main energy source. story:
The Infinium Book II is now available EXCLUSIVELY at IndieGoGo!

 

 

Which is why we need your help to make this happen!  We certainly hope you take interest in our project and will support it.  To help put into perspective, we've spent the last 20 years on this character and the universe it represents.  We've worked very hard to reward a small but growing fan base of loyal readers who took a chance with us by providing them some of the finest stories around, we now extend this invite to you!

 

The Impact

Any effort you make to contribute and support this campaign is greatly appreciated! For those of you who invite 3 or more people to this campaign, will receive a unique gift in recognition of your efforts.  

Through your support our hopes are to reach a much larger audience and expand our fan base by rewarding patrons with more than just fueling the completion of a comic book but by taking part of an early investment on a new era of character driven story telling.

In addition, your support provides a shot in the arm for credibility and revenue for a variety of contributing artists who represent a multi-national, gender diverse creative team of Tango Comics that spans across the world and hails from the U.S., Brasil, Croatia, Mexico, Puerto Rico, and Philippines to provide you this unique experience. 

 

Rewards

 

Risks & Challenges

The trade paperback is a completed body of work and is in the final coloring and editing stages.  Once completed all we need to do is get it to the printers so that it can be prepped to print and ship to you.   This lead time typically is around 1.5 - 2 months est. 

As for the figures, we have completed 3D rendered models and have ironed out all the wrinkles with the printed prototypes in order so that you receive the highest quality and durable figures, that can be made.  We've performed numerous prototypes and we're convinced these will be ready in conjunction with the lead times mentioned for printing.

Thank you so much for taking the time to look things over, we certainly hope we can earn your trust and business!
